span.title: dateTime Type: A date, date-time or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month). If hours and minutes are specified, a UTC offset SHALL be populated. The format is a union of the schema types gYear, gYearMonth, date and dateTime. Seconds must be provided due to schema type constraints but may be zero-filled and may be ignored. Dates SHALL be valid dates.

definition.value: Observation result value according to the type of observation

short.value: Measurement uncertainty type and interval if needed.

definition.value: Measurement uncertainty type and interval if needed.

short.value: Provides a reason why the expected value in the element Observation.value[x] is missing.

definition.value: Provides a reason why the expected value in the element Observation.value[x] is missing.

short.value: Reference range, multiple reference ranges of different types culd by provided. Provides guide for interpretation of result.

definition.value: Reference range, multiple reference ranges of different types culd by provided. Provides guide for interpretation of result.

comment.value: Reference ranges are usually implied only for a numeric scale type. Use of the same units for reference range and value is implied.

short.value: Information about reference intervals and result interpretation.

definition.value: Information about reference intervals and result interpretation.

short.value: Reference to the related resource from which the observation has been made. For example, a calculated anion gap or a fetal measurement based on an ultrasound image.

definition.value: Reference to the related resource from which the observation has been made. For example, a calculated anion gap or a fetal measurement based on an ultrasound image.

short.value: References to the observation(s) that triggered the performance of this observation.

definition.value: References to the observation(s) that triggered the performance of this observation.

short.value: This observation is a group observation (e.g. a battery, a panel of tests, a set of vital sign measurements) that includes the target as a member of the group.

definition.value: This observation is a group observation (e.g. a battery, a panel of tests, a set of vital sign measurements) that includes the target as a member of the group.
